name: SUPER FRIGGIN AWESOME PONG CLONE
description:
Its like Breakout had a baby with PONG and lived happily ever after.

A lot of games today have online multiplayer, but not the sit on the couch with a friend a another controller type of multiplayer that we miss; well I'm going to try to change that by revisiting an old classic and making it better with more versatility, space, and better sound!!! Isn't that freaking awesome? That's why I put in three exclamation points instead of one.

I recommend using responsive game pads preferably Xbox360 controllers to play, or you can just bump elbows at the keyboard(which is a lot more fun than it sounds).

P.S: Donations are strongly appreciated across the board, because it would be nice to get a license to put some of my games on the mobile market.
